sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { DinamicInput } from 'src/app/utils/DinamicInput'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nuevo-cliente', templateUrl: './nuevo-cliente.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nuevo-cliente.component.css'] }) export class NuevoClienteComponent extends DinamicInput{ formNewClient!: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { super(); } ngOnInit() { this.formNewClient = this.fb.group({ documentNumber: new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.pattern(/^[0-9]+$/)]), namesClient: new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z ]+$/)]), lastNamesClient: new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z ]+$/)]), state: new FormControl('',[Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z ]+$/)]), city: new FormControl('',[Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z ]+$/)]), street: new FormControl('',[Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z ]+$/)]), phoneNumber: new FormControl('',[Validators.pattern(/^[0-9]+$/)]), email: new FormControl('',[Validators.email]), }) } submit() { if(this.formNewClient.valid) console.log("registrd") } clean(){ this.formNewClient.get('documentNumber')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('namesClient')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('lastNamesClient')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('state')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('city')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('street')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('phoneNumber')?.setValue(''); this.formNewClient.get('email')?.setValue(''); } }
